synopsis.text: Hakua and Kougyoku Tsuranari, two heroes from another world, are now on a mission of a different kind: to assimilate into everyday life on Earth. With the guidance of Uro Yamada from the 'Hero Retirement and Return to Everyday Life Assistance Agency', the once-arrogant knight Hakua has embraced her new life and flourished as a dedicated working woman. However, her younger sister Kougyoku struggles to accept their new reality. Clinging to their past triumphs and her own blacksmithing skills, Kougyoku grapples with the idea of leaving their former lives behind. Will she find happiness in the mundane and learn to cherish their ordinary existence?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
